@description.name: @description
@description.body:
*****************************************************************

qooxdoo - the new era of web development http://qooxdoo.org Copyright: 2006 STZ-IDA, Germany, http://www.stz-ida.de License: MIT: https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT See the LICENSE file in the project's top-level directory for details. Authors: Til Schneider (til132) Fabian Jakobs (fjakobs) *

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The table pane that shows a certain section from a table. This class handles the display of the data part of a table and is therefore the base for virtual scrolling.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: paneScroller {qx.ui.table.pane.Scroller} the TablePaneScroller the header belongs to.
@param.description: the TablePaneScroller the header belongs to.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Whether the current view port of the pane has not loaded data. The data object of the event indicates if the table pane has to reload data or not. Can be used to give the user feedback of the loading state of the rows.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Whenever the content of the table pane has been updated (rendered) trigger a paneUpdated event. This allows the canvas cellrenderer to act once the new cells have been integrated in the dom.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The index of the first row to show.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The number of rows to show.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Maximum number of cached rows. If the value is -1 the cache size is unlimited

@description.name: @description
@description.body: overridden

@description.name: @description
@description.body: sparse array to cache rendered rows

@description.name: @description
@description.body: property modifier

@description.name: @description
@description.body: property modifier

@description.name: @description
@description.body: overridden

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the TablePaneScroller this pane belongs to.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the table this pane belongs to.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the currently focused cell.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: col {Integer?null} the model index of the focused cell's column.
@param.description: the model index of the focused cell's column.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: row {Integer?null} the model index of the focused cell's row.
@param.description: the model index of the focused cell's row.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
massUpdate {Boolean ? false} Whether other updates are planned as well.
          If true, no repaint will be done.
@param.description:
Whether other updates are planned as well.
          If true, no repaint will be done.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event handler. Called when the selection has changed.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event handler. Called when the table gets or looses the focus.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the column width.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: col {Integer} the column to change the width for.
@param.description: the column to change the width for.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: width {Integer} the new width.
@param.description: the new width.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event handler. Called the column order has changed.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event handler. Called when the pane model has changed.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event handler. Called when the table model data has changed.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: firstRow {Integer} The index of the first row that has changed.
@param.description: The index of the first row that has changed.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: lastRow {Integer} The index of the last row that has changed.
@param.description: The index of the last row that has changed.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: firstColumn {Integer} The model index of the first column that has changed.
@param.description: The model index of the first column that has changed.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: lastColumn {Integer} The model index of the last column that has changed.
@param.description: The model index of the last column that has changed.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event handler. Called when the table model meta data has changed.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: property apply method

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Clear the row cache

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get a line from the row cache.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: row {Integer} Row index to get
@param.description: Row index to get

@param.name: @param
@param.body: selected {Boolean} Whether the row is currently selected
@param.description: Whether the row is currently selected

@param.name: @param
@param.body: focused {Boolean} Whether the row is currently focused
@param.description: Whether the row is currently focused

@return.name: @return
@return.body:
{String|null} The cached row or null if a row with the given
     index is not cached.
@return.description:
The cached row or null if a row with the given
     index is not cached.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Add a line to the row cache.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: row {Integer} Row index to set
@param.description: Row index to set

@param.name: @param
@param.body: rowString {String} computed row string to cache
@param.description: computed row string to cache

@param.name: @param
@param.body: selected {Boolean} Whether the row is currently selected
@param.description: Whether the row is currently selected

@param.name: @param
@param.body: focused {Boolean} Whether the row is currently focused
@param.description: Whether the row is currently focused

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Updates the content of the pane.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
completeUpdate {Boolean ? false} if true a complete update is performed.
      On a complete update all cell widgets are recreated.
@param.description:
if true a complete update is performed.
      On a complete update all cell widgets are recreated.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: scrollOffset {Integer ? null} If set specifies how many rows to scroll.
@param.description: If set specifies how many rows to scroll.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: onlyRow {Integer ? null} if set only the specified row will be updated.
@param.description: if set only the specified row will be updated.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
onlySelectionOrFocusChanged {Boolean ? false} if true, cell values won't
          be updated. Only the row background will.
@param.description:
if true, cell values won't
          be updated. Only the row background will.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: If only focus or selection changes it is sufficient to only update the row styles. This method updates the row styles of all visible rows or of just one row.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
onlyRow {Integer|null ? null} If this parameter is set only the row
     with this index is updated.
@param.description:
If this parameter is set only the row
     with this index is updated.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get the HTML table fragment for the given row range.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: firstRow {Integer} Index of the first row
@param.description: Index of the first row

@param.name: @param
@param.body: rowCount {Integer} Number of rows
@param.description: Number of rows

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String} The HTML table fragment for the given row range.
@return.description: The HTML table fragment for the given row range.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Scrolls the pane's contents by the given offset.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
rowOffset {Integer} Number of lines to scroll. Scrolling up is
     represented by a negative offset.
@param.description:
Number of lines to scroll. Scrolling up is
     represented by a negative offset.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Updates the content of the pane (implemented using array joins).

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property qxOwner. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property qxOwner. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property qxOwner. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.
